about_the_game:
Wake Sylfie from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! An athlete that has grown bored of her mundane everyday, Sylfie can amass energy to shock foes and deal massive damage, getting the thrill she seeks!

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
detailed_description:

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
